title: Feature Request - Alternative hostname/IP connect option
author: sidedcore
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
<!-- If you file a feature request, please delete the bug section -->

Are there any plans to introduce an alternative Hostname/IP for connecting?

The servers I manage have Public and Private IP's and depending on location, access can be blocked.

Would be useful to have an additional field that could be accessed by Right click > Connect with options > Alternative Hostname/IP
